content.question: Which of the following best explains why <math alttext="A u" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>Au</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> has a larger radius than <math alttext="C u" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>Cu</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> does?

choices.label: <math alttext="A u" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>Au</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> has a larger electronegativity than <math alttext="C u" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>Cu</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> does.

<math alttext="A u" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>Au</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> has more occupied electron shells than <math alttext="C u" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>Cu</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> does.

<math alttext="A u" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>Au</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> has more protons than <math alttext="C u" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>Cu</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> does.

<math alttext="A u" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>Au</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> is more dense than <math alttext="C u" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>Cu</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> is.

content.answer: <math alttext="A u" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>Au</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> has more occupied electron shells than <math alttext="C u" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>Cu</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> does.

skill.text: 4.A: Predict and/or explain chemical properties or phenomena (e.g., of atoms or molecules) using given chemical theories, models, and representations.
